publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-1293 Ms Rosemary Byrne: Congratulations to Julie Fleeting-That the Parliament congratulates Julie Fleeting from Kilwinning, Ayrshire, on her achievements in women's football, her recent success in the FA Cup and her record of 88 goals in 78 internationals for Scotland; regards access to sport as a fundamental right for all Scottish schoolchildren, and urges the Scottish Executive to ensure that sufficient funds are made available for all children in state schools and to local communities to promote sport for all.
S2M-1293 Congratulations to Julie Fleeting (lodged on 10 May 2004) Frances Curran*, Carolyn Leckie*, John Swinburne*, Christine Grahame*, Dr Elaine Murray*
S2M-1293 Congratulations to Julie Fleeting (lodged on 10 May 2004) Marlyn Glen*

S2M-1293 Ms Rosemary Byrne: Congratulations to Julie Fleeting-That the Parliament congratulates Julie Fleeting from Kilwinning, Ayrshire, on her achievements in women's football, her recent success in the FA Cup and her record of 88 goals in 78 internationals for Scotland; regards access to sport as a fundamental right for all Scottish schoolchildren, and urges the Scottish Executive to ensure that sufficient funds are made available for all children in state schools and to local communities to promote sport for all. Supported by: Frances Curran, Carolyn Leckie, John Swinburne, Christine Grahame, Dr Elaine Murray, Marlyn Glen
S2M-1293 Congratulations to Julie Fleeting (lodged on 10 May 2004) David Mundell*
S2M-1293 Congratulations to Julie Fleeting (lodged on 10 May 2004) Pauline McNeill*
